inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: positive breath test after ingestion of 25 grams of fructose

inclusion.criterion: Women of childbearing potential must agree to a urine pregnancy test before supplement is dispensed and to avoid pregnancy throughout the study.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Cognitive impairment or any other inability to provide informed consent
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has dizziness and severe diarrhea since yesterday, with a history of abdominal pain, bloating, nausea, and loose bowel movements. V. cholerae was seen in dark-field microscopy of a fresh stool specimen.
